Buy with confidence from Magdon Music! ***Flat rate shipping is for the Continental USA (lower 48 only!) Pictured here we have a great deal on a display model 2018 Gibson Les Paul Standard Solid Body Electric Guitar in Blood Orange Burst. This guitar comes with its original Gibson Hard Case (shown) and all original case candy- which includes a pick guard and Gibson Strap. Guitar is in brand new condition- may have the slightest playwear from normal demo play- but WOW... what a deal on this one! Check it out! The iconic Les Paul Standard is celebrated by the world’s greatest musicians as the standard for perfection in the world of electric guitars. The new Les Paul Standard features the popular asymmetrical SlimTaper neck profile with Ultra-Modern weight relief for increased comfort and playability. Impeccable looks are highlighted by the powerful tonewood combination of mahogany back and carved maple AAA figured top. BurstBucker Pro humbuckers provide modern and classic tones, while immense tonal variety from comes from 4 push-pull knobs. Includes hardshell case.
